SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Ant
Constructs an Ant object with the specified nest node.
AntInterface
The decision to create this java class was made in such a way that in the future, if someone wants to change the way the Ant class is implemented, they can do it by modifying only the necessary lines of code, while the rest of the code will remain intact.
antMoveEvent
This class represents an event for ant movement in the simulation.
Colony
This class represents the colony of ants.
ColonyInterface
The decision to create this Colony Interface was made with the objective of retrieving all the information about a specific ant within the colony.
Edge
This class is responsible for defining an edge and its properties - source node, destination node, pheromone level, and weight.
Event
The abstract class representing an event in the simulation.
Generate
Generates a random graph with n nodes and randomly connects each node to 1 to n-i other nodes, where i is the current node index.
Graph
This class is responsible for defining a graph and its properties - nodes and edges.
Node
This class is responsible for defining a node and its properties - id and neighbors.
Parameters
This class is responsible for reading the parameters from the input file and storing them in global variables.
PEC
This class is responsible for defining the Priority Event Collection (PEC) and its properties.
PECInterface
This interface represents the PEC (Parallel Event-based Simulation) interface.
PheromoneEvaporationEvent
This class is responsible for defining a pheromone evaporation event.
Simulation
This class is responsible for defining the simulation.
SimulationReport
The class is responsible for defining a simulation report event.
TimeComparator
This class is responsible for comparing two events based on their time.
